Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
Honestly, this town's economy isn't healthy at
all. Some aspect of its business model just isn't
working.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
I see a better selection of products than before.
Seems the town's trading business is getting on
track.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
Well, there are products here that even I've never
seen. Seems trading is going well.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
This town's trading system deserves to be the
topic of a thesis. I'll write up the whole thing
and share it with all of academia.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
Pardon me if I ask a lot of questions about this
town. It's important to know every detail for my
research.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
I will gladly contribute to this town's economic
development, and by that I mean I'm here to
shop.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
I'm a scholar. I'm researching ways of
accelerating microeconomies through trade.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
This town's economy has become more active
than the last time I was here. I can tell just by
looking at the products on sale.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
As I thought, trade is the key to a town's
development.

<NAME_MOB_MARIA>
This town's trading system has certainly put it
on the map. Highly impressive.
